item.title: Automatically Deploying A Hugo Website via GitHub Actions
item.description: As a software engineer, I like to automate tedious tasks as much as possible. The deployment of this website is no exception: it is built using the Hugo static site generator and hosted on GitHub Pages; so would it not be nice if the rendered website would automatically be published whenever an update is pushed to its source code repository?

item.title: Time for a New Blog
item.description: It has been quite a while since the last post on my old personal blog; since then, I've mostly focused on writing about my day-work on the Debezium blog as well as some posts about more general technical topics on the Hibernate team blog.
